title: Apple 2023 MacBook Pro Laptop M2 Pro chip with 12‑core CPU and 19‑core GPU: 16.2-inch Liquid Retina XDR Display, 16GB Unified Memory, 512GB SSD Storage. Works with iPhone/iPad; Space Gray
descriptions:
### Product Listing: Apple 2023 MacBook Pro Laptop

---

**Product Name:** Apple 2023 MacBook Pro Laptop

---

#### Product Details:

**Chip Options:**
- **M2 Pro:** 12 CPU cores, 19 GPU cores, up to 32 GB of unified memory
- **M2 Max:** 12 CPU cores, up to 38 GPU cores, up to 96 GB of unified memory

**Battery Life:**
- Up to 22 hours of battery life

**Compatibility:**
- Adobe Creative Cloud
- Xcode
- Affinity Designer
- Microsoft 365
- iPhone apps
- iPad apps

**Display:**
- **Size:** 16.2 inches
- **Type:** Liquid Retina XDR
- **Features:** Extreme Dynamic Range, over 1000 nits brightness, HDR content, pro reference modes

**Camera and Audio:**
- **Camera:** 1080p FaceTime HD
- **Microphone:** Three-mic array
- **Speakers:** Six-speaker sound system with Spatial Audio

**Ports and Connectivity:**
- **Charging:** MagSafe
- **Data Ports:** Thunderbolt 4 (x3), SDXC card slot, HDMI
- **Audio Port:** Headphone jack
- **Wireless:** Wi-Fi 6E, Bluetooth 5.3

**Keyboard:**
- **Type:** Magic Keyboard
- **Features:** Full-height function key row, Touch ID

**Interoperability:**
- Universal Clipboard
- FaceTime calls
- Messages
- iPhone and iPad integration

**Build:**
- **Material:** All-aluminum unibody enclosure

**Software:**
- Free software updates for years

**Memory:**
- 16 GB of unified memory

**Storage:**
- 512 GB SSD

**Color:**
- Space Gray

---

**Product Features:**
- High-performance M2 Pro or M2 Max chip options
- Stunning 16.2-inch Liquid Retina XDR display with pro reference modes
- Advanced camera and audio system for clear communication and immersive audio experience
- Fast charging via MagSafe and robust connectivity via Thunderbolt 4 and Wi-Fi 6E
- Seamless integration with other Apple devices through Universal Clipboard and FaceTime calls
- Durable and sleek all-aluminum unibody design

---

**Note:** This product is designed for professionals and creative users who require top-tier performance and display quality. Ideal for graphic design, video editing, and other demanding tasks.

---

**Availability:** [Please check the official Apple website for the latest availability and pricing information.]

---

**Disclaimer:** Specifications and features may vary depending on the specific model and configuration. Please consult the official Apple documentation for the most accurate and up-to-date information.
